Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach

Record Class Options

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.github.sormuras.bach.Options
Record Components:
id - an internal identifier for this options instance
verbose - output messages about what Bach is doing
workflows - a list of workflows to execute
All Implemented Interfaces:
Wither<Options>
public record Options(Optional<String> id, boolean verbose, boolean dryRun, boolean runCommandsSequentially, boolean version, boolean help, boolean helpExtra, boolean printConfiguration, boolean printModules, boolean printDeclaredModules, boolean printExternalModules, boolean printSystemModules, boolean printTools, Optional<String> describeTool, Optional<String> loadExternalModule, boolean loadMissingExternalModules, Optional<AnyCall> tool, Optional<Path> chroot, Optional<String> bachInfo, Optional<String> projectName, Optional<ModuleDescriptor.Version> projectVersion, List<String> projectRequires, List<String> mainModulePatterns, List<String> mainModulePaths, Optional<Integer> mainJavaRelease, boolean mainJarWithSources, List<String> testModulePatterns, List<String> testModulePaths, Optional<String> limitTools, Optional<String> skipTools, List<Tweak> tweaks, List<ExternalModuleLocation> externalModuleLocations, List<ExternalLibraryVersion> externalLibraryVersions, List<Workflow> workflows) extends Record implements Wither<Options>

      public final String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

    • equals

      public final boolean equals​(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object); primitive components are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
